P

placeShips(boolean, int, int, int, int, Grid) - Method in class GameInterface
this method is used to check if a ship can be place and if it can it place the ship on the grid
placeShipsRandomly(Grid) - Method in class GameInterface
this method randomly places the ships on the grid for a player or for the computer
playerPlaceShips(Grid) - Method in class GameInterface
this method allows a player to choose if they want to place ships randomly or manually
playerPlaceShipsManually(Grid) - Method in class GameInterface
this method allows a player to choose the positions of their ships on the grid
playerTakeShot(Grid, Grid) - Method in class GameInterface
this method allow a player to choose the grid position the wish to fire at
playerTurn(Grid, Grid, Grid, String, int, int) - Method in class GameInterface
this method is for either players turn.
playerVsComputer(boolean) - Method in class GameInterface
A method that runs a player vs computer version of battleship, either stating a new game or loading a previous game Player and computer takes turns independently until 1 sides ships are all destroyed or until player quits the game
playerVsPlayer(boolean) - Method in class GameInterface
A method that runs a player vs player version of battleship, either stating a new game or loading a previous game.
processUserChoices() - Method in class Menu
A method that processes the main menu choices entered by the user.
